Table of Contents

Class HLBuffer

Namespace
Nebula.Serialization
Assembly
Nebula.dll

Standard object used to package data that will be transferred across the network. Used extensively by HLBytes.

[ScriptPath("res://addons/Nebula/Core/Serialization/HLBuffer.cs")]
public class HLBuffer : RefCounted, IDisposable
